class.name: TextEdit
class.description: TextEdit is meant for editing large, multiline text. It also has facilities for editing code, such as syntax highlighting support and multiple levels of undo/redo.

method.name: add_color_region
method.description: Add color region (given the delimiters) and its colors.

method.name: add_keyword_color
method.description: Add a [code]keyword[/code] and its [Color].

method.name: clear_colors
method.description: Clears all the syntax coloring information.

method.name: clear_undo_history
method.description: Clears the undo history.

method.name: copy
method.description: Copy's the current text selection.

method.name: cursor_get_column
method.description: Returns the column the editing cursor is at.

method.name: cursor_get_line
method.description: Returns the line the editing cursor is at.

method.name: cursor_set_column
method.description: Moves the cursor at the specified [code]column[/code] index. If [code]adjust_viewport[/code] is set to true, the viewport will center at the cursor position after the move occurs. Default value is [code]true[/code].

method.name: cursor_set_line
method.description: Moves the cursor at the specified [code]line[/code] index. If [code]adjust_viewport[/code] is set to true, the viewport will center at the cursor position after the move occurs. Default value is [code]true[/code]. If [code]can_be_hidden[/code] is set to true, the specified [code]line[/code] can be hidden using [method set_line_as_hidden]. Default value is [code]true[/code].

method.name: cut
method.description: Cut's the current selection.

method.name: deselect
method.description: Deselects the current selection.

method.name: get_breakpoints
method.description: Returns an array containing the line number of each breakpoint.

method.name: get_keyword_color
method.description: Returns the [Color] of the specified [code]keyword[/code].

method.name: get_line
method.description: Returns the text of a specific line.

method.name: get_line_count
method.description: Returns the amount of total lines in the text.

method.name: get_selection_from_column
method.description: Returns the selection begin column.

method.name: get_selection_from_line
method.description: Returns the selection begin line.

method.name: get_selection_text
method.description: Returns the text inside the selection.

method.name: get_selection_to_column
method.description: Returns the selection end column.

method.name: get_selection_to_line
method.description: Returns the selection end line.

method.name: get_word_under_cursor
method.description: Returns a [String] text with the word under the mouse cursor location.

method.name: has_keyword_color
method.description: Returns whether the specified [code]keyword[/code] has a color set to it or not.

method.name: insert_text_at_cursor
method.description: Insert the specified text at the cursor position.

method.name: is_folded
method.description: Returns whether the line at the specified index is folded or not.

method.name: is_line_hidden
method.description: Returns whether the line at the specified index is hidden or not.

method.name: is_selection_active
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the selection is active.

method.name: menu_option
method.description: Triggers a right click menu action by the specified index. See [enum MenuItems] for a list of available indexes.

method.name: paste
method.description: Paste the current selection.

method.name: redo
method.description: Perform redo operation.

method.name: remove_breakpoints
method.description: Removes all the breakpoints (without firing "breakpoint_toggled" signal).

method.name: search
method.description: Perform a search inside the text. Search flags can be specified in the SEARCH_* enum.

method.name: select
method.description: Perform selection, from line/column to line/column.

method.name: select_all
method.description: Select all the text.

method.name: set_line_as_hidden
method.description: If [code]true[/code], hides the line of the specified index.

method.name: toggle_fold_line
method.description: Toggle the folding of the code block at the given line.

method.name: undo
method.description: Perform undo operation.

method.name: unhide_all_lines
method.description: Unhide all lines that were previously set to hidden by [method set_line_as_hidden].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the breakpoint gutter is visible.
Duration (in seconds) of a caret's blinking cycle.
If [code]true[/code], the caret displays as a rectangle. If [code]false[/code], the caret displays as a bar.
If [code]true[/code], a right click moves the cursor at the mouse position before displaying the context menu. If [code]false[/code], the context menu disregards mouse location.
If [code]true[/code], a right click displays the context menu.
If [code]true[/code], all occurrences of the selected text will be highlighted.
If [code]true[/code], the line containing the cursor is highlighted.
If [code]true[/code], read-only mode is enabled. Existing text cannot be modified and new text cannot be added.
If [code]true[/code], line numbers are displayed to the left of the text.
If [code]true[/code], sets the [code]step[/code] of the scrollbars to [code]0.25[/code] which results in smoother scrolling.
If [code]true[/code], any custom color properties that have been set for this [TextEdit] will be visible.
If [code]true[/code], enables text wrapping when it goes beyond the edge of what is visible.

signal.name: breakpoint_toggled
signal.description: Emitted when a breakpoint is placed via the breakpoint gutter.

constants.constant: Cuts (Copies and clears) the selected text.
Pastes the clipboard text over the selected text (or at the cursor's position).
Represents the size of the [enum MenuItems] enum.

theme_items.theme_item: Sets the background [Color] of this [TextEdit]. [member syntax_highlighting] has to be enabled.
Sets the [Color] of the breakpoints. [member breakpoint_gutter] has to be enabled.
Sets the current line highlight [Color]. [member highlight_current_line] has to be enabled.
Sets the [Color] of the line numbers. [member show_line_numbers] has to be enabled.
Sets the spacing between the lines.
Sets the [StyleBox] of this [TextEdit] when [member readonly] is enabled.
Sets the highlight [Color] of text selections.
Sets a custom [Texture] for tab text characters.
Sets the highlight [Color] of multiple occurrences. [member highlight_all_occurrences] has to be enabled.
